title: Strengthening Science Learning Competencies Through Collaborative Digital Literacy Practices

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Digital Literacy Practice Course Using Online Collaboration Platforms for Science Majors and Job-Seekers

learning_goals: Learners can conduct science data visualization projects using collaborative digital tools (Google Workspace, Padlet, etc.).
Learners can write science topic reports reflecting peer feedback on online discussion platforms.
Learners can enhance their ability to judge the credibility of science-related information by applying digital information evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
